solution_line_template: He has {apples} apples and {bananas} bananas, so he has {apples} + {bananas} = <<{apples}+{bananas}={fruit_so_far}>>{fruit_so_far} pieces of fruit.
He needs to buy {total_fruit_needed} fruit - {fruit_so_far} fruit = <<{total_fruit_needed}-{fruit_so_far}={oranges_needed}>>{oranges_needed} oranges.
